results.name: Decay: a real time experience made in godot engine

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD 2200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: You should probably at least have XP, Vista, or Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Probably any
  • Additional Notes: If you have these and it doesn't run well, feel free to ask for your money back.
